entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:43 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 2:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -23.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -28.6°C
Wind: SW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
